file_content.text: I'll see that the Organa-Teral alliance is finalized and that you get to the summit.
I told you I can't--oh! Jedi! I appreciate your desire to help, and I will be sure to praise your zeal to Master Yuon.
But I am extremely busy right now. I can't afford interruptions.
Why is your holofrequency in House Rist's computer?
Been talking to Rist lately?
I would assume it's because Rist was invited to the summit.
You hired the assassins who kidnapped Lew Organa. Why?
Why did you kidnap Lew Organa?
Did you really think you'd get away with hiring House Rist to kidnap Lew Organa?
You're in trouble now.
I would be careful about making such outrageous accusations against a Jedi Master.
Now if you'll excuse me, Jedi, I have very important work to do.
Wait--Master Sidonie! I don't understand. What was her frequency doing here?
I assure you--Master Sidonie's not herself.
I'm sorry, but she's not well.
Should she be leading the summit, then? She could do something terrible!
I'm sure there is a good explanation, but I need to get to the summit to find out.
Neither can I.
I hope you're right, Jedi.
How much more proof do you need? That's why I need to get to the summit.
The woman's insane.
But if that's true, then the summit--delegates from all of Alderaan's houses. She could be planning something terrible!
Please, I need to get out of this place. My head is killing me, and I keep looking over my shoulder expecting more assassins.
